Subject: Did you know: you can vote on open issues?
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=137285340; y=rqafdiI4Cdlax2ifBV6v0qO7-Tu4VEFULsEhgs6BioGv
X-Yahoo-Profile: gojomo

A tip: our current JIRA-based issue tracking for Heritrix allows 
registered users to vote on open issues, and the popular ranking will be 
one factor in prioritizing bugfixes and enhancements for future releases.

The JIRA entry/login page is:

   http://webteam.archive.org/jira

The Heritrix project overview page is:

   http://webteam.archive.org/jira/browse/HER

- Gordon @ IA
